name: Holofy
slogan: Next generation platform for smart spaces designed with sharing in mind
description: We think shared spaces platforms like Airbnb,  have not evolved much for a while. That's why we built a better one from scratch aiming for a market network that gives all the tools hosts need, while taking the traveler from A back to A in the most seamless way. Pretty much like ordering an Uber the experience is worry-free and you are kept in the loop every single step of the way.

jobs.title: Backend Engineer, NodeJS, TS, Express
jobs.description:
Who we are

At Holofy we are building the future of living. Join one of the most exciting and well funded proptech startups in London. We are looking for developers with a passion for well designed, beautiful products who aren't afraid of a challenge.

Our short term goal is to consolidate some of our backend and optimise our internal API. To make it more developer friendly and scalable, we need our JS projects to be transitioned into Typescript while also trying to improve our CI/CD pipeline.

What we need

We are building an incredible product and to do that we need incredible people. You will need to a strong background in

Extensive Backend or Full-Stack Development experience
Excellent verbal and written communication
Experience working in Agile/ Kanban teams
Be able to write solid and delicate code within the following:
NodeJS with Javascript and Typescript including the translation between the two
NoSQL systems such as MongoDB or DocumentDB
Working knowledge of AWS
Past experience building and troubleshooting large scale cloud-based management systems
Expert knowledge of Express 
Experience with API testing frameworks
Strong experience with the creation of RESTful services and API's
We are a forward thinking team who are always looking to improve ourselves and our product. It would be great for you to have some knowledge or experience in the following technologies. If not, there will be plenty of opportunity to learn these new things and more whilst at Holofy. 

Knowledge of kafka, elasticsearch, or RabbitMQ
Experience with GraphQL
An understanding of cloud-native systems such as docker 
DevOps Knowledge
If you fit this description we will provide

A very competitive starting salary
Equity options
30 days of holiday + your birthday 
Personal development allowance for courses, conferences or anything else to help you progress
The latest equipment that you will need for your role
Flexible working hours and work from home days
Pension contributions
An incredible shoreditch office 
A Fully equipped kitchen and a stocked fridge
20-50% off bookings at any of our properties across the world for you and your friends/family
The application process

We realise that the interview process can be long and drawn out. At holofy we aim to move as quickly as possible. After reviewing your CV we will arrange a phone interview. After this stage, we will ask you to complete a small online development test. Finally, you will meet the development team as well as the founders.

Please do not contact us offering recruiting services.

jobs.title: iOS Developer
jobs.description:
Who are we

At Holofy we are building the future of living. Join one of the most exciting and well funded proptech startups in London. We are looking for developers with a passion for well designed, beautiful products who aren't afraid of a challenge.

Our short term goal is to consolidate some of our backend and optimise our internal API. To make it more developer friendly and scalable, we need our JS projects to be transitioned into Typescript while also trying to improve our CI/CD pipeline.

What we need

We are building an incredible product and to do that we need incredible people. You will need to be strong in the following criteria:
 
Extensive experience developing iOS apps
Excellent verbal and written communication
Experience working in Agile/ Kanban teams
Writing elegant Swift code for:
Building and maintaining parts of a networking layer
Implementing memory caching for offline use
Building reusable and adaptable UI components
Basic knowledge of the HTTP protocol and rest APIs
Working knowledge of GIT version control
Documenting app design decisions
Learning new technologies quickly
Providing constructive advice pertaining to existing architecture

We are a forward thinking team who are always looking to improve ourselves and our product. It would be great for you to have some knowledge or experience in the following technologies. If not, there will be plenty of opportunity to learn these new things and more whilst at Holofy. 
 
Knowledge of Realm Platform for efficient syncing and object handling
Curiosity of functional programming paradigms
ReactiveX for Swift
Knowledge of ARKit and Augmented Reality
Knowledge of any cross platform app development frameworks e.g. Flutter
 
If you fit this description we will provide

A very competitive starting salary
Equity options
30 days of holiday + your birthday 
Personal development allowance for courses, conferences or anything else to help you progress
The latest equipment that you will need for your role
Flexible working hours and work from home days
Pension contributions
An incredible shoreditch office 
A Fully equipped kitchen and a stocked fridge
20-50% off bookings at any of our properties across the world for you and your friends/family

The application process

We realise that the interview process can be long and drawn out. At holofy we aim to move as quickly as possible. After reviewing your CV we will arrange a phone interview. After this stage, we will ask you to complete a small online development test. Finally, you will meet the development team as well as the founders.
